notes: Tutorial loads up fine, but once out of it, VRChat just displays a black screen and nothing responding/happening.

title: VRChat
notes: Mouse input is jittery, tutorial works. But trying to go into the hub or home crashes the game with a black screen. Avatar invincible in mirror.

title: VRChat
notes: Overall performance seems to be okay but there is input jittering. Also some worlds are missing meshes/textures. Test was for Desktop Version

title: VRChat
notes: Avatars are mostly or completely missing. Hangs on loading most maps and on exiting game.

title: VRChat
notes: Works fine in non-vr mode. VR mode untested.

title: VRChat
notes: Camera movement is finicky; can be allieviated by turning mouse sensitivity all the way down. Some models do not load, others load partway, and some maps will hardlock the game.

title: VRChat

notes:
Tutorial worked fine. After that the game would get stuck on black screen when loading certain worlds. This can be avoided by joining a different world on launch: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWgHJ519B3U Audio worked in desktop mode. Performance wasn't any different from Windows. Avatars loaded fine, some didn't show up at all, though.

VR mode was also tested. Performance here was pretty much the same as on Windows. However, audio didn't work here.
title: VRChat

notes: VR doesn't work at all, in Desktop mode some materials are invisible and on loading some worlds the game stops working and just displays a black screen. Also the mouse glitches slightly to the bottom right all the time (unity wide)
title: VRChat

notes: Game crashes in VR (error popup), still many invisible materials and some worlds still kill the game (freeze). VR crash report: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1g7hxzuFNwEhAX8aokW-wV1N0nA5KJCnK/view?usp=sharing
